Journal.Title: Zhongguo Zhong yao za zhi = Zhongguo zhongyao zazhi = China journal of Chinese materia medica

Article.ArticleTitle: [A revision of species and distribution of medicinal plants in Guizhou Province].

AbstractText: To reconfirm the medicinal plants of Aristolochiaceae, Caryophyllaceae, Menispermaceae, Illiciaceae and Magnoliaceae found in Guizhou Province.
Making a textual research on the Latin names and geographical distribution of medicinal plants recorded in <<Medicinal Material Resources of Guizhou>>.
Of the above-cited medicinal plants 27 species are absent in Guizhou Province, 21 species and 2 varieties misnamed in Latin, and 8 species newly supplemented.

At present in Guizhou Province there are 22 species and 2 varieties of Aristolochiaceae, 29 species, 1 variety and 1 subspecies of Caryophyllaceae, 23 species and 2 varieties of Menispermaceae, 7 species of Illiciaceae, and 24 species and 1 subspecies of Magnoliaceae.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Guizhou Institute of Chinese Materia Medica, Guiyang 550002, Guizhou, China.
